name: Espio In Shinobi World
description:
Espio In Shinobi World

Date:November 23th 2019

Control

Arrow Keys To Move

Spacebar To Jump

Story/Plot

It Was Midnight , Espio Was Setting Up His Ninja Item In His Box But Someone Steal Them. Espio Go Without His Ninja Item To Find Out Who Steal His Item In His Box. It Up To Espio To Find Out Who Steal His Item From Him.
